itemDescription: British ceramist; second wife of James Spencer-Churchill, 12th Duke of Marlborough

wikipedia_page.main: Edla Spencer-Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough (née Griffiths; born 1968), is a British ceramist and aristocrat. She is the second wife of Jamie Spencer-Churchill, 12th Duke of Marlborough.

response: #Edla Spencer-Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough (born 1968): 2nd wife of James Spencer-Churchill, 12th Duke of Marlborough
* Edla Spencer-Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough (née Griffiths, born 1968), second wife of the 12th Duke
